settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage cloud and desktop embedding configuration in one place.

auth.requiredDesc: Sign in to view and save settings.

alert.consistencyDesc: Cloud uses the admin-selected embedding model to avoid dimension mismatches across requests.

cloud.title: Cloud Embedding (Admin Unified)
cloud.description: All cloud requests share the same embedding model.
cloud.editableHint: Admins can edit the cloud model
cloud.modelHelp: Ensures consistent vector dimensions in cloud.

desktop.title: Desktop Embedding (Local Only)
desktop.description: Only affects local desktop search, not cloud.
desktop.modelHelp: Local choice does not affect cloud dimensions.
desktop.unavailableDesc: Configure local embedding models in the desktop app.

actions.hint: Cloud and desktop settings are independent. Save as needed.

toast.noPermission: You donâ€™t have permission to save settings
